data.title: CDAO APEX Financial Services 2024
data.meta_description: Join us for Chief Data & Analytics Officer (CDAO), APEX Financial Services 2024, taking place on May 14-15, 2024, in Charlotte, NC!
data.text:
KYVOS

Kyvos is an AI powered semantic layer that supercharges analytics and AI initiatives. It establishes an enterprise-wide universal semantic layer, standardizes data interpretation, and enables conversational interactions with data. Kyvos delivers hyper speed analytics at any scale, along with significant savings on analytics cost.

The infrastructure-agnostic semantic layer is a critical building block of any modern data or AI stack, whether on-premises or on cloud. Leading enterprises use Kyvos to simplify and accelerate analytics, strengthen data governance and enable data federation to establish a single source of truth.

Visit website

ARCESIUM

Arcesium is a global financial technology company delivering pre- and post-investment and enterprise data management solutions to sophisticated financial institutions. Expertly designed to achieve a synchronized golden source of data throughout a client’s ecosystem, our technology is built to systematize complex workflows and help achieve scale.

Some of the world’s most sophisticated financial institutions, including banks, hedge funds, institutional asset managers, and private equity firms, rely on our advanced data, operations, and analytics platform to manage their investment lifecycle. We designed our elegant SaaS platform with industry-specific capabilities to harmonize massive amounts of disparate data and deliver unparalleled speed, accuracy, and decision-making capabilities.

Our capabilities include:

· Enterprise data solutions through our AquataTM and Financial Data Stack capabilities

· Universal investment and portfolio accounting books of record through our UBOR® platform

· Performance allocations, fund and investor accounting through our PerformA® toolset

· End-to-end reconciliation through our Reconciliation solution

· Treasury, collateral management, and portfolio finance through our Treasury Suite

· Managed Services to complement our comprehensive technology platforms

Arcesium launched with the mission to power the entire investment lifecycle. Building on a platform developed and tested by the D. E. Shaw group, we received additional equity backing from a second seed client, Blackstone Alternative Asset Management. J.P. Morgan, an early adopter of our technologies, later made a strategic investment in the company. Today, Arcesium services over $750 billion in global client AUM with a staff of over 2,000 software engineering, accounting, operations, and treasury professionals.

Visit website

ENTERPRISE AI

EnterpriseAIfurther sharpens and expands upon the already extensive coverage originating from its predecessor, EnterpriseTech, on machine/deep learning, advanced modeling/simulation, high performance data analytics and the technologies that enable them, including; high performance data centers, cloud computing, high performance storage, AI silicon and AI frameworks – spanning all relevant verticals. With its focus trained on decision-makers, technologists and thought leaders across the technology spectrum, EnterpriseAIdelivers reporting, insight and analysis on AI technologies, tools and strategies that enable business deployment and integration in the enterprise.

Visit website
